title: Development of geothermal resources on Maui
context: [ยง196D-14] Development of geothermal resources on Maui. To the extent an applicant&rsquo;s proposed project includes the development of geothermal resources on the island of Maui and the delivery of electric energy generated from these resources to the island of Oahu through the cable system, this chapter shall apply to that proposed project. [L 1988, c 301, pt of ยง1]
